GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
net: dsa: don't leak tagger-owned storage on switch driver unbind

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit 5809fb03942dbac25144db5bebea84fa003ecaca, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 7f2973149c22e7a6fee4c0c9fa6b8e4108e9c208. For more details please see the references link.
